entry.title: Monday: A few showers. High 8.
entry.summary: Showers except flurries inland early this afternoon. Wind southeast 40 km/h except 60 over exposed coastal sections. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4 except minus 1 near Campbell River. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers except flurries near Campbell River overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low plus 4 except minus 1 near Campbell River. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers except flurries near Campbell River early in the morning. Risk of thunderstorms in the afternoon.
